title: Christmas Celebration Thursday 10th December
desc: 'Wonderful!', 'one of the best Christmas Celebration nights I have been to', 'what a stunning evening!', 'the highlight of Christmas so far', 'a truly special evening', 'heartfelt, moving, joyous and fun', 'such a beautiful concert', 'glorious surroundings', 'a superb way to start the festive season', 'thank you, thank you, thank you'.??? Well we   go on but!....why not come and see for?yourself? The Legion's Christmas Celebration at Guildhall returns for a night of carols, champagne and celebrities!? Join us for two options - either come along to the Concert only in the grandeur of the Great Hall (and enjoy a drink beforehand in the atmospheric Crypts) or stay afterwards?for?a relaxing and fun?delicious black-tie dinner in the Old Library and with a glass of champagne in the Livery Hall.??? Absolutely fabulous!
